subsection_content:
The patient has eaten undercooked pork blood pudding, pork, lamb... and has symptoms such as myocarditis, arrhythmia, fever, eye edema, itchy feeling...
The disease is not transmitted from person to person, but outbreaks can occur in the same group of people, community or family that share common eating habits or eat contaminated food. If you discover that someone living around you is sick, you should also see a doctor for timely testing and treatment.
subsection_title: giun xoan.json. When to see a doctor?

If you discover that someone living around you is sick, you should also see a doctor for timely testing and treatment.
